features: [360° LUBRICATION RANGE]: Women's razors use an optimized design with a 360° lubrication range to provide a full range of lubrication experience. The new lubrication texture reduces razor irritation.

[TWO STORAGE STYLES]: The razor set comes with 2 handles, 14 cartridges and a shower holder. It can be stored on the bathroom countertop and is also suitable for storage on bathroom tiles and glass doors.
[5 PREMIUM BLADES]: The 5 blade razors for women with nano-coating technology for a smooth and clean shave. Reduce the chance of hair snagging while shaving, more transparent.

[EASY TO REPLACE]: Reinforced design at the razor connector, the snap is stronger and easier to replace. When replacing the razor head, just hold most of the head with the blade facing down and press the button to remove it.
[EASY TO CARRY]: The single-handled razor is lightweight and compact to meet your need to carry it around, providing more convenience for any scenario in daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product for a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great very sharp just wish it wasn’t disposable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite razor but not a 6 blade
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this razor; however, it does not contain 6 blades as the title suggests. The razor is actually a 5 blade razor with 3 spare razor heads and one preattached. I personally use only 6 blade razors because I feel they give the closest shave; however this razor does just as good as my 6 blade.I have tried so many razors and concluded that 6 blade was the only one I would buy from now on, but surprisingly, I will be replacing my 6 blade with this 5 blade razor. The razor handle is very comfortable and has an excellent grip on it. I love the pink color of the handle as well. The head of the razor pivots and glides so smoothly up and down your legs. I love that the additional 3 razor heads come sealed in their own bags to keep them sanitary until use. It is very easy to pop the razor head off to install a new one when needed.While shaving my legs, I noticed that the razor was not slipping at all while in the shower. I could glide over my skin with ease leaving my legs, underarms, and bikini areas incredibly smooth. I was left with zero razor burn, no cuts, just silky smooth legs. I am highly impressed with this razor.While I originally picked up this razor because it said it was a 6 blade, I am beyond impressed with the close and even shave I got from this razor. I have indeed found my new favorite razor. I 100 percent recommend this razor; it is one of the closest shaves I have ever gotten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest little razor i have ever seen. It is easy to hold thanks to the big handle, and creates a nice smooth gliding shave. Easy to pack up as its super small and has the cutest carrying case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for legs
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought wow, a Razor without lubrication, how strange. But then I realized it's there, it just doesn't glide off onto the skin. I got a nice close, irritation free shave on my legs. I did not enjoy using this razor on the lady parts. It pulled the hair and I had several nicks. The Razor has good pivoting motion, I usually get nicks on my knees and with these I did not. I like the plastic Razor head cover that it came with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great razor, comfortable to use and lasts awhile! Doesn't cause me to cut myself like other brands, especially when they're new. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This razor is sharp and has a close cut! The razor heads are easy to remove and replace. The razor handle is easy to grip and very lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Set of Razors
reviews.reviewText: This is a set of 6 replaceable head razors - they are pink but I don't think that will stop any of the men in my house from using it, so I don't really classify them as lady's or women only razors. The blades are easy to pop in and out when replacing them.I would purchase these again - they seem to be decent quality and I like the number of blades each "head" has.
